Well I was playing this game for no reason, when....well....Well the guy who works in restaraunt davis(the cook)asked Cue if she would taste his soup and she said it was really good. Then he started saying he grew up in Kalaragi. Is there any evidence of other MR3 areas???

By Eagle Fierce on Sunday, April 7, 2002 - 10:58 pm:

Nope. The only available areas are on that island. (Farm, BCB, Church, Live House, Restaurant Davis, Lab, Nelson's, Fire Dragon HQ, Tesca's during an event, and The Paradise of Monsters) I found it interesting that Kalaragi was mentioned the game, though. Though, the developers could not have possibly had MR3 data at the time, it felt like a nice tossback, and porvided a sort of depth in retrospect.
